name: Quiz About San Andreas
description:
GTA San Andreas was one of the most popular games of all time. Even today, this game holds a very large number of active players. We decided to make one short quiz of words to recall some details in the game that every player who has played san anderas should know.

This is the first version of the quiz, so there aren't many levels for now, but if we notice that the audience likes this kind of quiz game, we will supplement the game with new levels.

Play this quiz game about san andreas and show how well you remember this game. You may be surprised at how much you don’t actually know.

Some of the popular levels include the following:
-Ryder
-Sweet
-CJ
-Buffalo
-Tampa
-San Fierro
-Los Santos
-Las Venturas
-Restaurants
...etc

If you notice any bug or error, or just have an idea or question that you think we should include in this quiz game about san andreas, feel free to contact us at virtualac@europe.com

we hope that this quiz word game will cheer you up a bit :)
